## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Removing the effects of the cell cycle](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/single-cell/tutorials/scrna-case_cell-cycle/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
